title: Squad Shooter

controls: Move: WASD or arrow keyUse virtual joystick to move on mobile devices
content.howToPlay: Start your game by entering the arena filled with places to hide and spots to find enemies.As you walk around, you'll see different bad guys. Don't worry about aiming because your gun does that for you! When you get close enough to a bad guy, your gun starts shooting all by itself.Every time you defeat an enemy, they drop items like coins and health packs. Make sure to walk over these items to pick them up. They help you get stronger and keep playing longer!After you beat all the enemies, look for a treasure chest. Stand in front of it and wait a little bit. It will open up and give you more cool stuff!Now, find the way out to finish the level. When you find it, you'll finish the game round.Every level you play is a bit different and might be a little harder. This makes it super fun because you get to keep learning and getting better at the game!

fullContent: Home› ShootingSquad ShooterBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenLooking for a free game like Brawl Stars to play on your browser? Look no more. Squad Shooter is your cup of tea. Grab your gear and step into the boots of a lone hero in the Squad Shooter. Navigate through a dangerous mining field where outlaws run rampant. You must be ready to take them down. With no complex controls to slow you down, you’ll find yourself in the action from the very first click. Your weapon auto-targets and fires whenever enemies are within range. This lets you focus on your strategic movements and collecting loots. Over 40 great levels, Brawl Stars style 3D graphics, arenas filled with loots, character cards and various weapons... all for free and online.ControlsMove: WASD or arrow keyUse virtual joystick to move on mobile devicesHow to Play Squad ShooterStart your game by entering the arena filled with places to hide and spots to find enemies.As you walk around, you'll see different bad guys. Don't worry about aiming because your gun does that for you! When you get close enough to a bad guy, your gun starts shooting all by itself.Every time you defeat an enemy, they drop items like coins and health packs. Make sure to walk over these items to pick them up. They help you get stronger and keep playing longer!After you beat all the enemies, look for a treasure chest. Stand in front of it and wait a little bit. It will open up and give you more cool stuff!Now, find the way out to finish the level. When you find it, you'll finish the game round.Every level you play is a bit different and might be a little harder. This makes it super fun because you get to keep learning and getting better at the game!Make Your Character StrongerYou can make your character stronger so they can survive longer in the game and beat more enemies! Every time you play, you can earn coins. You can use these coins to make your character tougher. This means they won’t get knocked out as quickly!Cool Weapons to ArmYou start the game with a basic minigun, but as you play, you can upgrade it or unlock cooler guns that are way more powerful. Here’s how you can get new weapons:Collect Cards: When you defeat enemies, they might drop special cards. Collect these cards to unlock better weapons!Use Coins: You also get coins from defeating enemies. Save your coins because you can use them to upgrade your guns.Awesome GunsMinigun: This is your first gun. It shoots really fast!Shotgun: You can unlock this gun by collecting 5 cards. It’s great for hitting enemies that are close to you.Lavagun: You need 10 cards for this gun. It shoots fire and is super strong.Tesla Gun: This is another cool gun you can get with 10 cards. It zaps enemies with electricity!Developed ByThis game is developed by Watermelon Games.This article was updated on February 24, 20251 Player3DActionBattleCrazyFreeFunGunMobileShootingUnityWeapon
